mapper.insert: INSERT INTO practice (title, description, type, difficulty, duration, question_count, course_id, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{type}, #{difficulty}, #{duration}, #{questionCount}, #{courseId}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM practice WHERE course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM practice WHERE type = #{type} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM practice WHERE difficulty = #{difficulty} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM practice ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
